transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Namaste, mujhe email mein jaake teen mahine ka time chahiye.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Sir, actually na, main ek baar meeting mein hun, main aapko call back karti hun, please.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Abhi karti hun main. Haan ji, haan ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs three months time by email.

- Executive is in a meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- email, callback, meeting
